unnormalised: The much-awaited India vs. Pakistan cricket match is prepone to 14/10/2024 at 2:00 PM IST, as per sources. Initially, it was scheduled for 15/10/2024 but the BCCI thought it best to adjust the schedule due to Navratri festivities. This is expected to be a cracker of a match, so mark your calendars!
normalised: The much awaited India versus Pakistan cricket match is prepone to fourteenth October two thousand and twenty four at two P-M I-S-T, as per sources. Initially, it was scheduled for fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four but the B-C-C-I thought it best to adjust the schedule due to Navratri festivities. This is expected to be a cracker of a match, so mark your calendars! Other important matches include India versus Australia on eighth October two thousand and twenty four at two P-M and the final is tentatively planned for nineteenth November two thousand and twenty four. Don't forget to set your reminders, folks! Also, keep an eye out, there might be changes to the schedule depending on weather conditions. For those wondering about timings in other countries, the match will start at nine thirty A-M G-M-T. Let's hope team India brings home the cup this time around! You can catch the live telecast on Star Sports from one thirty P-M onwards.

unnormalised: Other important matches include India vs. Australia on 08/10/2024 at 2:00 PM and the final is tentatively planned for 19/11/2024. Don't forget to set your reminders, folks! Also, keep an eye out, there might be changes to the schedule depending on weather conditions.

For those wondering about timings in other countries, the match will start at 9:30 AM GMT. Let's hope team India brings home the cup this time around! You can catch the live telecast on Star Sports from 1:30 PM onwards.
